actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit the remission of certain overpayments made to members of the Armed Forces who are now retired, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the remission of overpayments for travel expenses made to members of the Armed Forces who are now retired who were on temporary assignment of the Federal Aviation Administration as sky Marshal under Operation Grid Square.

titles.title: A bill to permit the remission of certain overpayments made to members of the Armed Forces who are now retired, and for other purposes.
